titleStmt.title: A search for money. Or The lamentable complaint for the losse of the wandring knight, Mounsieur l'Argent Or come along with me, I know thou louest money. Dedicated to all those that lack money. By William Rovvley.
titleStmt.author: Rowley, William, 1585?-1642?

publicationStmt.publisher: [By George Eld] for Ioseph Hunt, and are to be solde [by John Wright] at Newgate Market, neere Christ Church gate,
